reviewText: I thought that this movie would be just like many of the other similar type movies....boy was I wrong!  This movie had a great plot, which so many other similar movies lack, and this movie also had great talent, too!  My favorite actor was actually, Jacky Wu, as he was the fastest swordsman I have ever seen!  You really need to watch this movie, "Triad Wars", because it is always moving and there is never a dull moment!
Triad Wars. The movie had a good amount of action, but no fights that really stood out. Sammo is getting pretty big.
Nothing new or essential in this movie, but good enough to watch at least once. There are better and worse movies in this genre.
the trailer just convinced me to buy it......excited
It don't get no better
It's not the godfather or the mafia has it says in the this is triad as said in the move I liked it great sword play and fights it's one for the books O the guns as they said it's TRIAD WARS
The action sequence were well played out but I wish sammo hung had more fight scenes. The story progressed very rapidly but flowed lots of blood and fighting but an amazing film

Love Sammo Hung - This movie just didn't seem to go much anywhere of interest.  The end fight was semi interesting - but appeared more interesting  before seeing the movie. I'd wait for Netflix or Amazon Prime to see it if one is curious.

I gave this film four stars, because it had action beginning to end. When you thought it was someone else it turned out to be the one closest to you. Wow that was hurtful. I enjoyed it a lot.

I would recommend it to anyone who like action and suspense.
I really enjoyed it, and it makes a good addition to my collection of good post Bruce Lee martial arts movies!
TOTAL RIPOFF!!!!!!! this is the movie "Fatal Move" (which I already own) They just changed the title and the dvd cover to make more money.  Buyers beware

this is a very good movie,full of action and i do mean ACTION from beginning to end.true marshal arts, fast  action all the way.very bloody,good plot.quick moves reminds me some what of bruce lees speed.amazon keep up the good work
I liked this movie a lot. the fight scene with sammo hung is worth it. I watched that car ambush scene at least a dozen time alone.
excellent

Some good fight scenes but not a "great" movie. Have seen better....with more substance. Jing Wu made this movie for me but would consider this more of a drama than action
